title: Brazil's hospitals running out of sedatives as COVID-19 rages
content:
1. Brazil's hospitals running out of sedatives as COVID-19 rages  Reuters
  2. Brazil: Failed COVID-19 Response Drives Humanitarian Catastrophe  Doctors Without Borders / MSF-USA
  3. Brazil’s Covid-19 response is worst in the world, says Médecins Sans Frontières  The Guardian
  4. In Brazil, an alarmingly high number of babies and children are dying of Covid-19  NBC News
  5. Brazil COVID-19: 'Humanitarian Crisis' With More Than 3000 Deaths A Day  NPR
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: COVID-19が猛威を振るう中、ブラジルの病院では鎮静剤が不足している
随着COVID-19的肆虐，巴西医院的镇静剂正在耗尽。
隨着COVID-19的肆虐，巴西醫院的鎮靜劑正在耗盡。
